channel.title: Mods lock this please i didnt know that i couldnt help any1! im sorry
channel.description:
first compiler right click on it and delete everything in it and put this then save
[code]@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
Now for your run server to work properly right click on it click edit delete everything and put this then save
[code]@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
and when u click compiler its blank for like 5 seconds... then it says Note:stream.java uses overides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. press any key to continue....
if it says that then it works properly

item.dc:creator: @justin4143 justin4143
item.description:
@justin4143 wrote:

first compiler right click on it and delete everything in it and put this then save

@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Now for your run server to work properly right click on it click edit delete everything and put this then save

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

and when u click compiler its blank for like 5 seconds… then it says Note:stream.java uses overides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
press any key to continue…

if it says that then it works properly
